Html: So, instead of using AppearanceManager to set the accent color, add a dependency property on ModernWindow named AccentColor of type System.Windows.Media.Color. And instead of setting Application.Current.Resources["AccentColor"], set ModernWindow.Resources["AccentColor"]. That way, the same application may have windows with different colors.
Good suggestion. Care to create an issue for it?
